text: It is easy to get around as it is just beside Eunos MRT, and the berths are not far away from Eunos Stn bus stop
V small place but v friendly inspectors & bus captains. Wheelchair friendly parking, ramps & lift to adjoining MRT station. V smooth commute time. Best!
Most buses are in the interchange. Some buses like 7, you have to walk a little. There are pocket guides there.

Last 18 th of February I took a 63 bus from Bugis to circuit road.When I got off the bus I realised that one of my bags is missing.
I knew that It was still in the bus and I took a taxi to the Eunos bus interchange in Order to check my bag if it’s still still in the bus.
But I had no idea that I could get my bag back.I was hopeless.There were some essential stuff in it.
As I hoped,the bus arrived to the interchange a few minutes later.And I waited to talk to the driver.
This gentleman “Saw cheong Seng(the senior bus captain)”had my bag in his hands and I was so glad to get my bag back.And I’m so thankful  to this driver.

Eunos MRT Station is a normal bus interchange, that is usually empty. Do note: For some buses, its a really far walk! However, there are a number of shosp here ranging from hairstylist, 7-eleven, electronics and even food stalls.
